name: WVMBR
0:
”Alexa, play W. V. M. B. R.”
”Alexa, start W. V. M. B. R.”
”Alexa, open W. V. M. B. R.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: w. v. m. b. r.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the official W V M B R Skill, you can hear your favorite radio right now on Alexa! 

WVMBR is a Christian Internet Radio Station. Our mission is to expand the Kingdom for Christ through broadcasting Contemporary Christian and Praise & Worship music. We also broadcast Sunday worship services, along with Bible Studies, and prayer times. The Music, The Message, The Difference. WVMBR - The Next Generation of Christian Radio. To play WVMBR on your Alexa devices, simply as Alexa to Open or Play W V M B R
